lead_paragraph: Jordan Spieth cruised to victory at the Hyundai Tournament of Champions on Sunday, closing with a six-under-par 67 for an eight-shot victory over Patrick Reed in Kapalua, Hawaii.
snippet: Jordan Spieth cruised to victory at the Hyundai Tournament of Champions on Sunday, closing with a six-under-par 67 for an eight-shot victory over Patrick Reed in Kapalua, Hawaii.
abstract: Jordan Spieth wins Hyundai Tournament of Champions golf tournament in Kapalua, Hawaii; other golf news noted.
